alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Rosebud; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:58PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Thunderstorms winds will impact portions of Stillwater, northeastern Big Horn, north central Carbon, Musselshell, Yellowstone, Golden Valley, Rosebud and Treasure Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking hi based thunderstorms throughout the region. Movement was east at 30 mph. These storms will appear weak but will produce downburst winds. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Areas of blowing dust could reduce visibility. Lightning is possible. Locations impacted include... Billings, Hardin, Colstrip, Columbus, Roundup, Forsyth, Hysham, Custer, Laurel, Joliet, Fromberg, Ryegate, Melstone, Worden, Huntley, Ballantine, Lockwood, Crow Agency, Busby and Shepherd. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Rosebud; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure
